item.title: Juicy Code
item.description:
Check out this JUICY! code:

def with_value_from_database(value) self.class.from_database(name, value, type) end def with_cast_value(value) self.class.with_cast_value(name, value, type) end def with_type(type) if changed_in_place? with_value_from_user(value).with_type(type) else self.class.new(name, value_before_type_cast, type, original_attribute) end end
